items.title: Awesome Python
items.content_text:
### Serverless Frameworks

*   [Zappa (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/zappa/Zappa) - A tool for deploying WSGI applications on AWS Lambda and API Gateway.
items.content_html:
Serverless Frameworks

items.title: Awesome Microservices
items.content_text:
### Platforms

*   [Wing](https://www.winglang.io/) - Cloud-oriented programming language. It allows developers to build distributed systems that fully leverage the power of the cloud without having to worry about the underlying infrastructure.

### Frameworks / Runtimes

*   [Spin (‚≠ê6k)](https://github.com/fermyon/spin) - An open source framework for building and running fast, secure, and composable cloud microservices with WebAssembly.
items.content_html:
Platforms

  • Wing - Cloud-oriented programming language. It allows developers to build distributed systems that fully leverage the power of the cloud without having to worry about the underlying infrastructure.

Frameworks / Runtimes

  • Spin (‚≠ê6k) - An open source framework for building and running fast, secure, and composable cloud microservices with WebAssembly.

items.title: Awesome Orgs
items.content_text:
### Web

*   [Unified](https://github.com/unifiedjs) - Content as structured data, powering @remarkjs, @rehypejs, @retextjs, and @redotjs, used to build things like @mdx-js, @prettier, @gatsbyjs, and so much more!
*   [Nest](https://github.com/nestjs) - A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient and scalable server-side applications üöÄ.
*   [Choo](https://github.com/choojs) - (very) small browser tools. Choo choo.

### Other

*   [ReadMe](https://github.com/readmeio) - Beautiful, personalized, interactive developer hubs ü¶â.
items.content_html:
Web

  • Unified - Content as structured data, powering @remarkjs, @rehypejs, @retextjs, and @redotjs, used to build things like @mdx-js, @prettier, @gatsbyjs, and so much more!
  • Nest - A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient and scalable server-side applications üöÄ.
  • Choo - (very) small browser tools. Choo choo.

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Deployment Hosting

*   [Vercel](https://vercel.com/) - Cloud platform for building and deploying serverless web applications, static websites, and Jamstack (mainly Next.js) projects.
